file.title: Index without quotes

p.text: The command searches the specified text and returns the number of character the text starts with. Letter case is ignored while searching, i.e. letters "A" и "a" are regarded as identical. If while searching a piece of text in quotes is found then this piece is ignored. In case nothing is found command returnns "0".
